title.rendered: Silencil Review | Buy Silencil – 50% OFF Regular Price

content.rendered:
Silencil™

Silencil Supplement

  • 100% natural blend
  • Treat root cause of tinnitus
  • Purest and highest quality ingredients
  • 28 carefully mixed plant extracts and vitamins
  • FDA approved facility
  • Non-GMO and safe

*Disclaimer: Individual results may vary. The information on this website has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Get Your Life Back With Silencil

Tinnitus has become an epidemic. Almost a tenth of the global population suffers from this debilitating disease. But most people are not aware how widespread this “ringing in the ears” is. If you talk to doctors, you’ll find that there is no official cure.

In fact, most people tend to laugh it away as they don’t realize the significant impact of this disease on the quality of life. Many people have lost everything to tinnitus as they are unable to focus. They severed close relationships as they were constantly irritated and depressed.

The Background

Thankfully, there is a cure available now in the form of a nutritional supplement known as Silencil. And you have Henry Sanders to thank for that. Henry Sanders is an ex-tinnitus sufferer. His condition was so bad that he even went to the Manhattan hospital for the insane, for 2 weeks. Fortunately, his family helped him get through those tough times and eventually, he was able to pull himself back from the devastating spiral. Finally, he decided to devote his life to finding a cure for this epidemic.

He started researching and came across research published by the American Neurological Association, University at Buffalo, and University of Arizona, among others. During his research, he found that the major cause of tinnitus or ringing in the ears is brain inflammation. He was working with a big pharmaceutical company at that time and was able to consult with some of the best doctors and scientists in the field and this is how he met Dr. Thomas Peterson.

Dr. Peterson shared with him the research that nailed down the ultimate or real root cause of tinnitus which is brain inflammation. They joined hands and came up with this brilliant nutritional supplement that gets rid of brain inflammation and stops tinnitus. Once the brain inflammation is gone, nerve cells in the brain begin to heal and regain their strength which leads to complete vanishing of that constant ringing in the ears.

What Is Silencil?

Silencil is a nutritional supplement made from 28 natural ingredients. These ingredients have been chosen based on their ability to stop brain inflammation and prevent common memory disorders such as dementia, amnesia and memory loss. This nutritional supplement will not only help your get rid of tinnitus but will also boost your focus, memory and your general well-being.

What Makes It Different?

You must be wondering what makes this nutritional supplement different from hundreds of others in the market. One of the things you need to know is that the ingredients in this formula have been carefully chosen from among thousands of varieties of powerful herbs. Not many people know that Hawthorn has over 1000 species and there are more than 200 species of Skullcap. However, only a few specific ones have the ability to stop brain inflammation. Similarly, other herbs species have been carefully chosen to stop brain inflammation and to prevent memory loss as well as other such deadly diseases.

List of Ingredients

There are a total of 28 powerful ingredients in this nutritional supplement. Some of the more powerful ones include Hawthorn and Skullcap. These are essential to stopping brain inflammation. Another one is Oat Straw which helps in ending tinnitus and makes your brain function better. The 2 other major ingredients include Mucuna Pruriens and Rhodiola. These ingredients help in strengthening neurotransmitters in your brain and prevent further brain inflammation.

Some of the other ingredients in the supplement include vitamin B1, B2, B6 as well as potassium, GABA, L-Theanine, Chamomile, and Ashwagandha, among others.

Benefits of Silencil

  • It is a completely natural nutritional supplement with no reported side effects.
  • It will help you get rid of tinnitus.
  • It will boost your memory and help you focus.
  • It will improve your general well-being.
  • It has been used by more than 120,000 people over 6 continents successfully.
  • It is produced in an FDA approved facility.
  • It is non-GMO and completely safe.
  • It can be taken by anyone regardless of their age.
  • It is also diabetic friendly.
  • You don’t have to follow any restrictive diets.

Pricing

Even though you can buy a single bottle at $69 with a small shipping fee, most people order either the 3 bottle or 6 bottle package. The 3 bottle package will set you back by $177 and for the 6 bottle package, you will have to pay only $294. Both the 3 bottle and 6 total package come with free shipping. Also, you can buy it only from the official website.

What makes the deal better is that you get a complete 60 day money back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with the results, just ask for your money back.

Final Thoughts

Don’t believe the lies by the pharmaceutical industry that tinnitus can’t be cured. There is a cure but it has been kept away from general public due to the profits involved. The tinnitus and hearing aids industry is worth $20 billion a year and nobody wants a cure that permanently cures this disease. They want you to continue to pay.

Silencil is a completely natural nutritional supplement that allows you to get rid of tinnitus by stopping brain inflammation and allowing the nerve cells in your brain to completely heal. It has already helped more than 120,000 people all over the world. You also get a 60 days money back guarantee which means there is absolutely no risk for you. Order today and get your life back.

Silencil™

Silencil Supplement

  • 100% natural blend
  • Treat root cause of tinnitus
  • Purest and highest quality ingredients
  • 28 carefully mixed plant extracts and vitamins
  • FDA approved facility
  • Non-GMO and safe

*Disclaimer: Individual results may vary. The information on this website has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
